summary.span: 命名空间包含一组类型和一组类，前者表示 Entity Framework 在模型中普遍使用的概念，后者则有助于应用程序对元数据进行处理。

span.span: The namespace contains a set of types that represent concepts throughout the models used by the Entity Framework and a set of classes that help applications to work with metadata.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关如何使用此命名空间的详细信息，请参阅 [ADO.NET Metadata](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/bb399207(v=vs.90))。For more information about how to use this namespace, see [ADO.NET Metadata](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/bb399207(v=vs.90)).
